thread.title: Mary Kay Cabot: Browns Need To Pick Trubisky And Trade For Garoppolo
thread.title_full: Mary Kay Cabot: Browns Need To Pick Trubisky And Trade For Garoppolo

author: CBS Cleveland
title: Mary Kay Cabot: Browns Need To Pick Trubisky And Trade For Garoppolo
text:
Mary Kay Cabot: Browns Need To Pick Trubisky And Trade For Garoppolo February 3, 2017 9:36 AM Filed Under: anthony lima , Cleveland Browns , Cleveland Plain Dealer , Jimmy Garoppolo , Ken Carman , Mary Kay Cabot , Mitch Trubisky , Super Bowl CHAPEL HILL, NC - NOVEMBER 05: Mitch Trubisky #10 of the North Carolina Tar Heels scores a touchdown against the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets during the game at Kenan Stadium on November 5, 2016 in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. North Carolina won 48-20. (Photo by Grant Halverson/Getty Images) 
Mary Kay Cabot of the Cleveland Plain Dealer & Cleveland.com joined The Ken Carman Show With Anthony Lima live from the Super Bowl to talk all the latest with the Cleveland Browns. The Ken Carman Show With Anthony Lima Follow
